data.message:
No reason to bash me I'm human so is everyone else. Doesn't mean u comment ! This is my opinion and I have a say in this to ! Troops die everyday for this damn country but no one acknowledges  it

 I support trump  and liked Eminem music why does everyone hate everyone    ! This generation and world is so fucked up everyone hates everyone everyone makes fun of everyone  yes people shouldn't of kneel for national anthem it's not right everyone has there say in it people need to respect people !! America is going straight to hell !!! Where the hell is all the Respect where the hell is all the people who don't care what ur doing we shouldn't judge anyone !!!  U don't want ur kids doing it in school to other people then why should u ?  Bullying ! Talking shit ! Wether it's true or false. We need to be better than that !! Everyone has a say in shit but really ? Where is this world coming to just getting worse and worse !

Wanna bash me go ahead your no different ! Only God can judge and I have a say in it to ! But we shouldn't be hating people hate is strong word ! And therefor we need God back in this country and respect and more love and less hate for anyone  !! And what Obama did is make our country worse not better ! That's all I have to say ! My opinion ! So don't bother commenting  bc I don't wanna hear negativity instead of listening to what people say  people talk shit no matter if you do good or bad ! True story !!! Everyone in this world has tribulation doesn't mean we have to make it worse  the guy next door maybe lost his wife or mom or daughter commit suicide bc bullying and people talking shit will cause kids to take there life and why don't we care ? We r supposed to help not make them more shitty about themselves  no wonder why kids think it's ok bc they see there parents talk shit no matter if it's a president or neighbor or if there mom sees. A prettier lady  bc she's prettier than you ? u don't talk shit about people ! !!!  Know that person first and hang out with them and say it to there face not social media not video on music if you have a problem with someone you confront them you don't make the story bigger and bigger bc that's what people do they say one thing and turns out to be bigger than what it is !!!  You can hate me all you want for saying this but it's true ! Be the bigger person !  Stand up for what's right not what's wrong !! Have respect !! No wonder why kids don't have respect anymore bc they see adults don't so they think it's ok !! Which it's not !! Like seriously America 
Grow up be the better person lets love not hate yes you can have a opinion but don't bash don't hate everyone is guilty on this !!  Yes we all make mistakes but time to be better person and do stuff right now wrong !!!
